Adding New Protocols to the PyOfWave ServerÂ¶

Note

Not fully implemented.

Protocols are programmed in PyOfWave using Twisted. Integration is provided by core as documented in Using PyOfWave’s Core module. Saying that, there’s a few organizational things we do to keep things tidy.

  1. Place your protocol in it’s own folder inside protocols.
  2. Tie it into the system in __index__.py.

Use Tornado ‘s reactor module in place of Twisted ‘s, as to avoid networking classes between the modules. Tornado is used because py:mod:Python XMPP Server (which we use for the main protocol) uses it.
